solution_line_template: Jackson used {initial_meat_kg} x {meatball_fraction} = <<{initial_meat_kg}*{meatball_fraction}={meat_for_meatballs}>>{meat_for_meatballs} kilograms of meat to make meatballs.
He had {initial_meat_kg} - {meat_for_meatballs} = <<{initial_meat_kg}-{meat_for_meatballs}={meat_after_meatballs}>>{meat_after_meatballs} kilograms of meat left.
So {meat_after_meatballs} - {meat_for_spring_rolls} = <<{meat_after_meatballs}-{meat_for_spring_rolls}={remaining_meat}>>{remaining_meat} kilograms of meat are left.
